channel.title: I guess i would call this jokes?
channel.description:
[center][size=14pt][u][b]Welcome to Bmaw's joke thread![/b][/u][/size]
I will be taking the jokes i find funny and posting them below.
Try not to be too racist.
Also please do not flame people if they post shitty jokes or if you don't like their jokes.
[size=14pt][u][b]Jokes[/b][/u][/size]
I picked your mom up in the Chinatown District during a Crossfire, and then put her in a Vacant room. We had a Showdown and I put my Bloc Pipeline in her Overgrown Ambush and Countdowned til I Downpoured a Shipment of Wetwork all over her; it smelt like a Bog, but hey. The bed started to Creek and Crash on top of me. So I did her up the Backlot and Striked her good. I Broadcasted it on YouTube.
[quote author=Frell link=topic=381691.msg2868087#msg2868087 date=1247574462] A jew, a nigger and a Mexican walk into a bar. What does the owner say? Get the fuck out.[/center]

item.title: I guess i would call this jokes?

[/quote]

item.title: I guess i would call this jokes?
item.dc:creator: @P_I_M_P_3_D_Tut `Lewk_
item.description:
@P_I_M_P_3_D_Tut wrote:

[quote=“Frell, post:7, topic:288691”]A jew, a nigger and a Mexican walk into a bar.

What does the owner say?

Get the fuck out.[/quote]
What. I don’t get it. They told niggers, Jews and Mexicans to gtfo?
Bravo. FUCKING HILARIOUS.

@TabbyKiller
I lol’d at all of them

Read full topic
item.source: I guess i would call this jokes?

item.title: I guess i would call this jokes?
item.dc:creator: @TabbyKiller TabbyKiller
item.description:
@TabbyKiller wrote:

There was a english man, a jamacian man, a scottish man and a maori man all standing on the edge of a cliff.
The jamacian man grabs a bottle of rum and throws it over the cliff and says “theres heaps of that in our country”.
The scottish man grabs a bottle of whiskey and throws it over the cliff and says “theres heaps of that in our counrty”.
The maori man grabs the english man and throws him over the cliff and says “theres heaps of them in our country”.

Dont say thats Racist or something its just a Joke going around New Zealand…[br][br][size=1]Posted on: July 18, 2009, 09:00:28 am[/size][hr]Rangi was standing on the door step watching Tama collecting the rubbish.
As Tama went by he yells out to Rangi
“Hey bro where’s you bin??”

Rangi replies, “I bin in Australia!”

“NO!” replies Tama, “where’s your Wheelie Bin?”

“Oh I wheelie bin in jail, but I tell people I bin in Australia!!”

[br][br][size=1]Posted on: July 18, 2009, 09:01:35 am[/size][hr]Where do Maori’s get they’re family portraits done?
From da Speed Camera’s [br][br][size=1]Posted on: July 18, 2009, 09:02:01 am[/size][hr]Whats the fastest thing in the world?
A Maori with a KFC voucher

[br][br][size=1]Posted on: July 18, 2009, 09:02:27 am[/size][hr]Whats the second fastest thing in the world?
The Maori running away from the guy he stole the voucher from

[br][br][size=1]Posted on: July 18, 2009, 09:05:36 am[/size][hr]There was an Englishman an Irishman and a Maori who all wanted to join the army but they had to pass a test first…

The Englishman went in and the guy asked, “What would happen if one of your eyes got stabbed out?” He said, “I’ll be half blind!” Then he asks, “What would happen if both your eyes got stabbed out?” The Englishman said, “I’ll be full blind!” The guy said, “Sweet u pass, next!”

So the Irishman came in and the guy asked the same questions and the Irishman gave the same answers so he passed too…

The Maori man was listening at the door for the answers so the guy thought he’d change the questions…

He goes to the Maori man… “What would you do if one of your ears got cut off?” The Maori man said, “I’ll be half blind!” Then he asks, “What would you do if both your ears got cut off?” And the Maori man goes, “I’ll be full blind!” The guy goes, “Whys that?” The Maori man goes, “Cause I’ll have no ears to hang my glasses on!”

[br][br][size=1]Posted on: July 18, 2009, 09:07:42 am[/size][hr]A maori has a hen which, every morning, rain or shine, lays him an egg in his front garden. This is all very well and good until one day, the hen lays the egg in the next door neighbour’s garden.

Before the maori can go and get it, a samoan runs out the door and grabs the egg.
The maori yells to the samoan, ‘Bro, that’s my egg.’

‘How do you figure?’ asked the samoan.

‘It’s my hen.’
‘It’s my garden!’

‘Tell you what, bro’ said the maori, ‘we’ll settle this Aoteoroa (New Zealand) style. I kick you in the balls as hard as I can, and you kick me in the balls as hard as you can and whoever gets up the quickest wins the egg.’

The samoan thinks about this for a minute, looked at his feet, and remembered he was wearing a nice heavy pair of steel-capped boots. The maori was bare-foot, ‘Ok!’

The maori takes a run-up and kicks the samoan in the nuts as hard as he can.

The samoan lies groaning on the ground for about 15 minutes, and then gets up.

‘Now it’s my turn,’ says the samoan, with a smile.

‘Nah, bro, you can keep the egg.’
[br][br][size=1]Posted on: July 18, 2009, 09:13:48 am[/size][hr]One day there was a Maori man,african,aussie and chinesse man and they were all on a plane that was going to crash because of all the Weight on the Plane. So the Piolet says Lose some of the Laggage!

So the African man says Im doing this for my Country and Jumps out the Plane.
And the Chinesse man says Im doing this for my Country and Jumps out.
And then the Maori man says Im doing this for my Country and Pushes the Aussie out.

No offence to anyone while im telling these jokes sorry[br][br][size=1]Posted on: July 18, 2009, 09:19:36 am[/size][hr]There was an Aussie guy who was in a pub with a group of friends. He went to buy a beer when the barman said “Did you know that you could get a free beer?” and the Aussie guy says “Really? How?” Then the barman told him “Tell me how many “D’s” there are in 'Here Comes the Bride”’. So the Aussie guy says “One”. Then he got his free beer. He went back to his table and told his friends that he got a free beer. Then his Maori friend got up and went to the barman and asked what he had to do to get a free beer. The barman told him “Tell me how many “D’s” there are in 'Here Comes the Bride”’. Then the Maori guy said to him " Hang on a minute" and went to the toilet. A few moments later, the Maori came out (with a grin on his face) and said “I know how many “D’s” there are” and the barman, who was quite ammused, asked “How many?” and the Maori goes “thirty-six” and the barman asked “How did you get 36?”. The Maori guy replied “Easy… da da-da da, da da-da da…” (as in ‘singing’ the tune for the bridal walk)

Read full topic

item.dc:creator: @noobie22 Noobie22
item.description:
@noobie22 wrote:

ownagepk52:

a blonde walks in a hair dresser with her i pod she sits down to have her hair cut. the hairdresser asks her to remove her ipod and she refuses. then she goes to get her hair washed and the lady askes her to remove the ipod because it might get wet and again she refuses. then while her hair is being cut she falls asleep. a perfect oppitunity he removes the ipod. immidently the blonde drops dead to the floor, scared shitless the hair dresser lifts the ipod to his ear and this is what he heard… breath in…breath out…breath in…breath out…

Sooooooooooooo old. It was a funny joke in its time.

what do you call a bunch of niggers working in a field?
the good ole days
what do you call a bunch of niggers lying down in the back of your truck?
a good days hunting
I was driving down the road the other day and all of a sudden two black people stepped out of nowhere, one went through my windscreen, the other went flying several hundred feet down the road. The police have been most helpful so far, one was charged with leaving the scene of an accident the other was charged with breaking and entering

item.title: I guess i would call this jokes?
item.dc:creator: @Mitko Mitko
item.description:
@Mitko wrote:

Here’s 1:
God and Bill Gates

“Well, Bill”, said God, “I’m really confused on this one. I’m not sure whether to send you to Heaven or Hell! After all, you helped society enormously by putting a computer in almost every home in the world and yet you created that ghastly Windows. I’m going to do something I’ve never done before. I’m going to let you decide where you want to go!”

Mr. Gates replied, “Well, thanks, Lord. What’s the difference between the two?”

God said, “You can take a peek at both places briefly if it will help you decide. Shall we look at Hell first?” “Sure!” said Bill. “Let’s go!”

Bill was amazed! He saw a clean, white sandy beach with clear waters. There were thousands of beautiful women running around, playing in the water, laughing and frolicking about.

The sun was shining and the temperature was just perfect!

Bill said, “This is great! If this is Hell, I can’t wait to see Heaven!”

To which God replied, “Let’s go!” and off they went. Bill saw puffy white clouds in a beautiful blue sky with angels drifting about playing harps and singing.

It was nice, but surely not as enticing as Hell. Mr. Gates thought for only a brief moment and rendered his decision

“God, I do believe I would like to go to Hell.”

“As you desire,” said God.

Two weeks later, God decided to check up on the late billionaire to see how things were going. He found Bill shackled to a wall, screaming among the hot flames in a dark cave. He was being burned and tortured by demons.

“How ya doin’, Bill?” asked God. Bill responded with anguish and despair.

“This is awful! This is not what I expected at all! What happened to the beach and the beautiful women playing in the water?”

“Oh, THAT!” said God. “That was the screen saver”

Read full topic
